segment.source: Viewing MBAM 2.5 Reports for the Stand-alone Topology
segment.target: Viewing MBAM 2.5 Reports for the Stand-alone Topology

segment.source: The Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Stand-alone topology provides reports that you use to monitor BitLocker usage and compliance.
segment.target: The Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Stand-alone topology provides reports that you use to monitor BitLocker usage and compliance.

segment.source: MBAM reports key recovery activity and the compliance status of the computers and devices that it manages across your enterprise.
segment.target: MBAM reports key recovery activity and the compliance status of the computers and devices that it manages across your enterprise.

segment.source: See the following topics for information about Stand-alone reports:
segment.target: See the following topics for information about Stand-alone reports:

segment.source: Generating MBAM 2.5 Stand-alone Reports
segment.target: Generating MBAM 2.5 Stand-alone Reports

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If you are using the Configuration Manager Integration topology, most reports are generated from Configuration Manager rather than from MBAM.
segment.target: If you are using the Configuration Manager Integration topology, most reports are generated from Configuration Manager rather than from MBAM.

segment.source: See Viewing MBAM 2.5 Reports for the Configuration Manager Integration Topology.
segment.target: See Viewing MBAM 2.5 Reports for the Configuration Manager Integration Topology.
